issue.title: JIT: Skip HIP `thrust::sort` test

labels.name: cat:test
labels.description: Test code / CI

labels.name: to-be-backported
labels.description: Pull-requests to be backported to stable branch

issue.body:
Rel. https://github.com/cupy/cupy/pull/7139#issuecomment-1298198379

```
22:48:26 cupyx_tests/jit_tests/test_thrust.py .......xxsstimeout: the monitored command dumped core
22:48:27 /src/.pfnci/linux/tests/actions/unittest.sh: line 26:  1401 Aborted                 timeout --signal INT --kill-after 60 18000 python3 -m pytest "${pytest_opts[@]}" "${PYTEST_FILES[@]}"
22:48:33 + test_retval=134
```

comment.body:
@takagi Failed to backport automatically.

----

```
Not cleanly cherry-picked
```

issue.title: Fix `boxcox_llf`

labels.name: cat:bug
labels.description: Bugs

labels.name: to-be-backported
labels.description: Pull-requests to be backported to stable branch

issue.body:
Following up https://github.com/cupy/cupy/pull/6849.

This PR fixes `boxcox_llf` to return a scalar array of nan instead of float nan when empty data is given as well as improving its tests on the testing tolerance and input ranges.

issue.title: Fix `boxcox_llf`

labels.name: cat:bug
labels.description: Bugs

labels.name: to-be-backported
labels.description: Pull-requests to be backported to stable branch

issue.body:
Following up https://github.com/cupy/cupy/pull/6849.

This PR fixes `boxcox_llf` to return a scalar array of nan instead of float nan when empty data is given as well as improving its tests on the testing tolerance and input ranges.
